name: BibleEducationalQuiz
0:
”Alexa, open bible educational quiz”
”Alexa, start bible educational quiz”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bible educational quiz
des:
The quiz is intended to learn rather than test, some basic facts about the Bible, Christians often don't know and provide a bit more perspective to understand the Bible. After each question, some explanation is given. It also doesn't intend to raise controversial facts, which most scholars won't agree with, but to educate us with some of the lesser-known facts, which is valuable.
While playing the quiz, you can say "Alexa, next" to move to the next question. At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the quiz. This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
